name: Gearheart
0:
”Alexa, show me Tom Hanks movies”
”Alexa, tune to NBC”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
Video Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Gearheart skill is for customers who have the IMCTV TV Service powered by the Elevate SaaS Platform from Espial Inc. (http://bit.ly/espialinc)”

Use the Gearheart skill to control your TV Experience with your voice using an Amazon Alexa-enabled device. Free yourself from the remote control and go completely hands-free to enjoy a truly lean-back TV experience.

Tune to a channel, search for or play your favorite content, and even pause, fast-forward, or rewind through your programs.

You can say:
"Alexa, tune to channel 5"
"Alexa, find Game of Thrones"
"Alexa, watch Breaking Bad"
"Alexa, pause"
"Alexa, play"
"Alexa, rewind"
"Alexa, fast-forward"
"Alexa, back 5 minutes"
"Alexa, skip 2 minutes"
"Alexa, resume"
"Alexa, back"
"Alexa, next"
